item.title: Hugo
item.description: A hugo theme environment for stand-alone creative code experiments, reducing the learning curve so you can enjoy being in the zone. Download 1.4 Our goal to curate best practices (integrating, testing, documenting) to play with: processing p5js ml5js PWA (so it works well on mobile browsers) Installation Download latest release Unzip it and rename as play Move entire folder inside your huge themes folder On config.
